Articles.Content: I bought the game during February of 2016, and proceeded to play the game like crazy for about 2 years, then I stopped playing. Now I want to get back in the game, finally made a ksp forum account and noticed that a ksp 2 has been announced. Has anything game changing been added since I left? Thanks in advance!

52 minutes ago, Fins4Life said:

I bought the game during February of 2016, and proceeded to play the game like crazy for about 2 years, then I stopped playing. Now I want to get back in the game, finally made a ksp forum account and noticed that a ksp 2 has been announced. Has anything game changing been added since I left? Thanks in advance!

Welcome back.

Lots of changes, two DLCs, part updates, etc.  and in 1.8 an updated engine
